name: Mt. Better-Than-Everest
description:
This game was made for the GamesPlusJam 2021! It is a 2D Platformer about Mt. Better-Than-Everest, a new mountain formed due to the shifting of the tectonic plates. It is 25% taller than Mt Everest, hence the name. A bounty goes out: The first person to scale the mountain will receive $1,000,000 as a reward! You play as Jack, who will tackle the challenge of scaling the mountain along with your partner, Kelsey.

This is our first time doing a Game Jam. Criticism of any kind is welcome and appreciated.
